resources.string: Spectra is the literary society of Vidya Knowledge Park, the first student oriented society in the campus.
Not a member? Sign up now.

• Speech must have been previously delivered in public by any famous personalities or characters. (Politicians, actors or speeches in movies etc.)
 • Prior information should be given to the coordinators.
 • Negative points for Paper reading
 • Speeches are to be max ten minutes in length.
 • Imitation of the original speaker should be accurate with the same notion.
When you have confidence like a Lawyer and have the wit like them "Lawsuit" is the event for you.
In this event one has to copy the given speech of a famous personality.

• Presentation (10)
 • Body language (10)
 • Costume (05)
 • Fluency (10)
 • Imitation (15)

• Dialogues (10)
 • Fluency (10)
 • Flow of Topic (10)
 • Logic (10)
 • Co-ordination (10)
Imitating and copying your favourite actor\'s dialogue, moves and actions, who doesn\'t love it??\n If yes then this event is the best!!

\u2022 Two candidates are required, one boy and one girl.\n \u2022 A clip will be played and none has to imitate the actor and the actress.\n \u2022 Scores will be given on the basis of the performances of both.

• This is a team event.(Maximum 2 members)
 • A case would be given and the two opposing teams have to defend their end of bargain.
 • The total time for each case is 10 minutes.
 i) 2 minutes for Prosecutor
 ii) 2 minutes for Defender.
 iii) 4 minutes for Discussion.
 iv) 30 seconds for break.
 v) 1:30 seconds for Conclusion.
 • Judges decisions are final, and they will not be required to explain standing. • Limited Participation, which is done on First Come First Serve Basis.

• Presentation (10)
 • Strength of argument (20)
 • Content/Fluency (10)
 • Body Language (10)
This is a team event in which the participants has to do a radio show.

• This is a team event of 2 to 5 members.
 • The total time allotted will be 10 minutes.
 • 2 songs are allowed to sing(not fully) and musical instruments are allowed.
 • Judges decisions are final, and they will not be required to explain standing.
 • Limited participation, which is done on First Come First Serve Basis.
 • Both English and Hindi can be used.

• Presentation (10)
 • Time-Management (10)
 • Content/Fluency (10)
 • Voice Modulation (10)
 • Team Work (10)
Submit your membership fee to one of our core member to be a member of Spectra:The Literary Society.

• To Provide a place of collaboration for English majors, writers, literary artists, and any other students at Vidya Knowledge Park

 • To Provide a forum for club members and other students to share their favorite works of literature in poetry and prose.

 • To Provide a place to share and develop creative works of student's own creation.
